meanings.sent1: In the pond, I saw many volvoxes swimming together.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the volvoxes under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The volvoxes had a party in the water, celebrating their unity.
meanings.sent4: The volvoxes moved as one, like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The volvoxes glowed green, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: a type of colonial green algae consisting of numerous flagellated cells
meanings.sent1: The volvoxes in the lake formed a beautiful green colony.
meanings.sent2: Under the microscope, the volvoxes appeared as tiny green spheres.
meanings.sent3: The volvoxes threw a flagella party, waving their tiny tails in unison.
meanings.sent4: The volvoxes clung together like a close-knit family.
meanings.sent5: The volvoxes swam gracefully, propelled by their flagella.

meanings.definition: a group of spherical organisms that reproduce asexually
meanings.sent1: The volvoxes multiplied rapidly in the lab, reproducing without a partner.
meanings.sent2: Each of the volvoxes in the cluster was capable of independent reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The volvoxes organized a cloning contest to see who could replicate the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The volvoxes were like tiny spheres of life, self-replicating in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The volvoxes filled the petri dish with their asexual offspring.
